name: Tissot PRX Watch
description: Tissot PRX T1374101104100 is a functional and special Gents watch from PRX collection. Case is made out of Stainless Steel and the Blue dial gives the watch that unique look. In regards to the water resistance, the watch has a water resistance of 100 metres. This makes it suitable for swimming, but not high impact water sports. The watch is shipped with an original box and a guarantee from the manufacturer.

name: Tissot Chrono XL Chronograph Watch
description: Exclusive to WatchShop, the Tissot Chrono XL Chronograph watch makes a big statement with its cool looks and on-trend style. The Tissot Chrono XL Exclusive Chronograph watch strikes the perfect balance between informal and smart with its low-key fabric strap and powerful black-and-blue colour scheme. Hard-wearing sapphire glass keeps it looking good as new, while the luminescent hands mean the watch looks great even when the sun goes down. Sporty, sophisticated, stylish – what more do you need?
features: Water-resistant to 100m, great for swimming and water sports
Chronograph function for elapsed time measurement, adding functionality
Luminescent hands, allowing for easy time-reading in the dark
Powered by a quartz watch movement for superb time accuracy

name: Tissot Supersport Chronograph Watch
description: Tissot Supersport T1256171104100 is a practical and attractive Gents watch from Supersport collection. Case material is Stainless Steel while the dial colour is Blue. The features of the watch include (among others) a chronograph. 100 metres water resistance will protect the watch and allows it to get submerged in the water for everyday usage including swimming, but not high impact water sports. The watch is shipped with an original box and a guarantee from the manufacturer.

name: Tissot Tradition Automatic Automatic Automatic Watch
description: Mens Tissot Tradition Automatic Watch T0634282203800

name: Ladies Tissot Everytime Watch
description: Tissot Everytime T1432101101100 is an incredible attractive Ladies watch. Case material is Stainless Steel while the dial colour is Silver. 50 metres water resistancy will protect the watch and allows it to be submerged in water for periods, so can be used for swimming and fishing. It is not recommended for high impact water sports. The watch is shipped with an original box and a guarantee from the manufacturer.

name: Emporio Armani Watch AR11227
description: This Gents Giovanni Emporio Armani Watch is a colourful designer timepiece with high class. The gorgeous deep-blue dial contrasts with the elegant silver hour markers, which feature Roman numerals and the iconic Armani logo at 12 o’clock. There’s a discreet date window at 6 o’clock, and a polished stainless steel bracelet with butterfly clasp to complete the look. The Gents Giovanni Emporio Armani Watch is a stylish fashion accessory that can be paired with any outfit, whether you’re at work or at play.
features: Water-resistant to 30m so you don’t have to remove it when washing your hands
Long lasting and rust-resistant 44mm stainless steel case
Luminescent hands, allowing for easy time-reading in the dark
Powered by a quartz watch movement for superb time accuracy

name: Ladies Emporio Armani Watch
description: Emporio Armani AR11517 is a beautiful and interesting Ladies watch. Case is made out of Stainless Steel, which stands for a high quality of the item and the Silver dial gives the watch that unique look. 30 metres water resistance will protect the watch and allows it to be worn in scenarios where it is likely to be splashed but not immersed in water. It can be worn while washing your hands and will be fine in rain. We ship it with an original box and a guarantee from the manufacturer.

name: Mens Emporio Armani Watch
description: Emporio Armani 42mm watch features a black sunray with cut out dial, at least 50% recycled stainless steel case, automatic movement and black silicone strap.

name: Mens BOSS Santiago Two Tone & Green Watch
description: BOSS gents watch from the Santiago family. Featuring a 44mm stainless steel case with gold IP bezel, dual time movement, green dial and two-tone gold IP and stainless steel bracelet. Water resistant to 5ATM

name: Boss Gala Watch 1502557
description: BOSS ladies watch from the Gala family. Featuring a 28mm gold IP case with crystal set bezel, white Mother of Pearl dial and gold IP bracelet. Water resistant to 3ATM

name: Boss Praise Watch 1502547
description: BOSS ladies watch from the Praise family. Featuring a 36mm gold IP case, gold dial decorated with a ring of crystals, gold IP slim mesh bracelet and mesh clasp. Water resistant to 3ATM.

name: Mens BOSS Pilot Edition Chronograph Black Watch
description: BOSS gents watch from the Pilot Edition Chrono family. Featuring a 44mm black IP stainless steel case with slide-rule bezel, retrograde chronograph movement, black dial and black IP stainless steel bracelet. Water resistant to 5ATM.

name: Boss Flawless Watch 1502551
description: Hugo Boss Flawless 1502551 is an amazing watch from Flawless collection. Material of the case is Plated Stainless Steel while the dial colour is Silver. 30 metres water resistancy will protect the watch and allows it to be worn in scenarios where it is likely to be splashed but not immersed in water. It can be worn while washing your hands and will be fine in rain. We ship it with an original box and a guarantee from the manufacturer.

name: Olivia Burton Lucky Bee White MOP Demi Dial & Gold Bracelet Watch OB16FB18
description: Our iconic Lucky Bee has had a sparkly reinvention with a luxurious new mother of pearl dial finish. Housed in glistening gold the 34mm pearl dial sets off the beauty of the detailed body and wings perfectly - this little bee is not afraid to shine.

name: Ladies Olivia Burton Mermaid Tail Watch
description: If you’ve always wanted to channel some mermaid vibes, here’s how. As you can probably tell, Olivia Burton must have had a lot of fun designing this mermaid-tail inspired timepiece. A shimmery rainbow of scalloped scales adorns the bold Demi dial, all set off by contemporary silver casing and mesh strap. This is guaranteed to bring a smile every time you look down at your wrist.
features: Sultry in silver
Delicate and pretty mesh bracelet strap
A mermaid in disguise
Part of Olivia Burton`s Under The Sea collection

name: Ladies Olivia Burton Dancing Dragonfly Watch
description: Meet a mesmerizing member of Olivia Burton`s bug family - the dancing dragonfly. The sun-dappled dial is reminiscent of warm summer days, beautifully complemented by a Pearl Pink strap. Rose gold 3D dragonflies set with crystals dance across the Midi dial. These beautiful little bugs are all about new beginnings, so what better way to kick off your watch collection?
features: Pretty ivory leather watch strap
Delicate dragonflies for a decadent finish
Regal rose gold case
All about new beginnings

name: Ladies Michael Kors Janelle Chronograph Watch
description: Both blingy and bouji, this Michael Kors Janelle Watch will have your wrist glistening with glory. The Janelle features a gold diamante-studded strap and matching dial, proving all the razzle dazzle you will ever need. Featuring three subdials, characteristic of a chronograph watch, the highly adorned face presents its hour markers as batons, with Roman numerals utilised at 12 o`clock.
features: Rust-resistant stainless steel case
Metal bracelet strap for great security
Powerful quartz movement for ultimate time precision
Date window, so the wearer always has the date right at their wrist
Water-resistant to 50m, so can be worn whilst shallow swimming

name: Ladies Michael Kors Runway Chronograph Watch
description: Designed straight off the runway, staying true to its name, the Runway by Michael Kors is a watch exuberating seductive styling in the addition to great functionality. Featuring a multi-dial clock face, chronograph and date function, the Runway is much more than just a fashion piece; helping you always stay on time.
features: Water-resistant to 100m, great for swimming
Powered by a quartz watch movement for superb time accuracy
Date function so you always have the date at your wrist
Chronograph function for elapsed time measurement, adding functionality

name: Mens Michael Kors Layton Watch
description: This eye-catching accessory is water resistant to 50 metres, so it can be worn for light swimming and can even handle being submerged for a short while. It keeps superb time thanks to its powerful quartz movement, and the dial is protected by hardwearing mineral glass. The jet-black case and dial contrast perfectly with the vibrant gold tones of the dial and bracelet. The dial features chunky gold hour baton markers and luminous hands, and there’s a date window at 6 o’clock
features: Water-resistant to 50m so you don’t have to remove it when washing your hands
Bold black-and-gold colour scheme for maximum bling factor
Powered by a quartz watch movement for superb time accuracy

name: Mens Maurice Lacroix Aikon Automatic Automatic Watch
Mens Junghans FORM C Chronograph Watch
Marathon Government Search & Rescue Tritium Night Vision Watch
description: Built in accordance with U.S Government specification, and commonly known as the TSAR (for Tritium Search and Rescue), the Marathon Large Diver’s watch allows you to dive deeper, thanks to its 1000m Water resistance capabilities and its screw-down crown. It truly was designed for divers and built to withstand the harshest and most challenging conditions. It has been crafted with a Stainless Steel case and powered by a high-torque Swiss ETA movement, which is reliable and highly accurate.
